description:
For those who prefer minimal cushioning between their foot and shoe, their Men’s Run Zero Cushion Low Ankle Pattern socks are as comfortable as they are durable. Made from ZQ-certified Merino wool, these socks offer loads of comfort through the 4 Degree™ elite fit system, the anti-slip Achilles tab, breathable mesh zones, and the great benefits of the wool itself.

Plus, they’re enhanced with Indestructawool™ technology, which offers extended durability zones for long-lasting use. When it comes to putting the miles under your feet—whether it’s on a trail, the pavement, or a treadmill—these socks are purpose-built for your feet to love.
name: Smartwool Run Zero Cushion Low Ankle Pattern Socks - Mens
